IMUSim
 
[ Module Hierarchy | Class Hierarchy ]

Module Hierarchy

  • imusim: IMUSim - simulator for inertial and magnetic sensing systems and algorithms.
    • imusim.algorithms: Algorithms for processing inertial/magnetic sensor data.
      • imusim.algorithms.calibration: Calibration algorithms for IMU sensors.
      • imusim.algorithms.orientation: Algorithms for tracking orientation using inertial/magnetic sensor data.
      • imusim.algorithms.position: Algorithms for tracking the position of a body model.
      • imusim.algorithms.posture_reconstruction: Algorithms for reconstructing the posture of a body model.
      • imusim.algorithms.vector_observation: Algorithms for estimating orientation from reference vector observations.
    • imusim.behaviours: Behavioural code specifically designed to run on simulated devices.
      • imusim.behaviours.basestation: Behaviours for basestation devices.
      • imusim.behaviours.imu: Behaviours for IMU devices.
      • imusim.behaviours.mac: Base class for MAC algorithm implementations.
      • imusim.behaviours.orient_tdma: Simulation model of the TDMA scheme used by the Orient IMU system.
      • imusim.behaviours.sampling: Sampling behaviours.
      • imusim.behaviours.timing: Timing behaviours.
    • imusim.capture: Classes to represent real world captured data.
      • imusim.capture.marker: Classes to represent marker-based capture data.
      • imusim.capture.sensor: Classes to represent captured sensor data.
    • imusim.environment: Models of the environment experienced by simulated IMU devices.
      • imusim.environment.base: Overall model of the environment experienced by simulated IMUs.
      • imusim.environment.gravity: Gravitational field models.
      • imusim.environment.magnetic_fields: Magnetic field models.
      • imusim.environment.radio_environment: Radio environment models.
    • imusim.io: Code for reading and writing various data formats.
      • imusim.io.asf_amc: Reading of ASF/AMC body model movement files.
      • imusim.io.bvh: Reading and writing BVH body model movement files.
      • imusim.io.qualisys_tsv: Loader for Qualisys optical capture data in TSV format.
      • imusim.io.vicon_csv: Loader for Vicon optical capture data in CSV format.
    • imusim.maths: Code implementing pure mathematical functionality.
      • imusim.maths.integrators: Iterative integrator implementations.
      • imusim.maths.kalman: Standard and unscented Kalman filters.
      • imusim.maths.matrices: Utilities for working with matrices.
      • imusim.maths.natural_neighbour: Cython wrapper for natural neighbour C implementation.
      • imusim.maths.quat_splines: Spline fitting of quaternion data.
      • imusim.maths.quaternions: Quaternion maths.
      • imusim.maths.splines: Spline fitting.
      • imusim.maths.transforms: Mathematical transforms.
      • imusim.maths.vector_fields: Classes for modelling 3D vector fields.
      • imusim.maths.vector_splines: Spline fitting of vector data.
      • imusim.maths.vectors: Functions for working with column vectors.
    • imusim.platforms: Models of IMU components and platforms.
      • imusim.platforms.accelerometers: Accelerometer models.
      • imusim.platforms.adcs: Analogue to digital converter models.
      • imusim.platforms.base: Base class for simulated hardware platforms.
      • imusim.platforms.basestations: Basestation hardware platform models.
      • imusim.platforms.gyroscopes: Gyroscope models.
      • imusim.platforms.imus: IMU hardware platform models.
      • imusim.platforms.magnetometers: Magnetometer models.
      • imusim.platforms.radios: Radio models.
      • imusim.platforms.sensors: Base classes for sensor models.
      • imusim.platforms.timers: Models of hardware timers.
    • imusim.simulation: Simulation engine.
      • imusim.simulation.base: Simulation engine for IMUSim.
      • imusim.simulation.calibrators: Simulation of calibration procedures for IMUs.
    • imusim.testing: Useful code for writing tests.
      • imusim.testing.inspection: Utilities for code introspection.
      • imusim.testing.quaternions: Utilities for testing quaternion values
      • imusim.testing.random_data: Functions and classes for generating random data to use in testing.
      • imusim.testing.trajectories: Utilities for testing trajectories.
      • imusim.testing.vectors: Test utilities for vectors.
    • imusim.trajectories: Classes for representing and synthesising spatial trajectories.
      • imusim.trajectories.base: Base classes for trajectories.
      • imusim.trajectories.multi_marker: 6DOF trajectories from multiple 3DOF marker trajectories.
      • imusim.trajectories.offset: Trajectories at fixed offsets from other trajectories.
      • imusim.trajectories.rigid_body: Modelling of rigid body models for motion trajectory generation.
      • imusim.trajectories.sampled: Classes representing sampled trajectories.
      • imusim.trajectories.splined: Continuous splined trajectories from sampled trajectories.
    • imusim.utilities: General purpose utility code.
      • imusim.utilities.caching: Decorators to enable caching of function results.
      • imusim.utilities.documentation: Utilities for documenting code.
      • imusim.utilities.time_series: Classes for representing time series data.
      • imusim.utilities.trees: Support for basic tree structures.
    • imusim.visualisation: Data visualisation tools.
      • imusim.visualisation.plotting: Support for plotting IMUSim data types.
      • imusim.visualisation.rendering: 3D data rendering using Mayavi.
      • imusim.visualisation.video: Support for creating videos.

IMUSim
